titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the 1993 increase in income taxes on Social Security benefits.
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the 1993 increase in income taxes on Social Security benefits.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal, effective January 1, 2009, the 1993 increase in income taxes on Social Security benefits.
